topics.body: Tallow, Schmaltz, or Lard?
topics.author: 4fde5cee945b700a970060fc

topics.body:
Also after the movie me and my brother fell for some marketing trick when walking through the mall.

This lady came up to us and told me to lift up my hands and I was "Ok" and she dumped this weird white stuff on it and than goes "Since you have it on your hands you have to come over here" and I gotta say usually at this point I'm like "Great, Fucking scams"


DUUUUUUDE, this salon shit was fantastic! Long story short she did a various of things to my hands with this product and it made my hands feel fucking *BABY SMOOTH*.

If only you were there to feel my hands! fuck this shit was smooth!
